24: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּֽטַּמְּא֖וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>Defile</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> אֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>not ye yourselves in any of these things</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>by</n> בְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>things</n> נִטְמְא֣וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>are defiled</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>for in all these the nations</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>which I cast out</n> מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>

26: וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Ye shall therefore keep</n> אַתֶּ֗ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֻקֹּתַי֙ <sup>2708 </sup> <n>my statutes</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and my judgments</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and shall not</n> תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and shall not commit</n> מִכֹּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>[any] of these abominations</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> הָֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <sup>249 </sup> <n>[neither] any of your own nation</n> וְהַגֵּ֖ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>nor any stranger</n> הַגָּ֥ר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>that sojourneth</n> בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n>
27: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֣ת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>abominations</n> הָאֵ֔ל <sup>411 </sup> <n>(For all these</n> עָשׂ֥וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>done</n> אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>which [were] before</n> וַתִּטְמָ֖א <sup>2930 </sup> <n>is defiled</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>you and the land</n>
28: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תָקִ֤יא <sup>6958 </sup> <n>spue not you out</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>That the land</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> בְּטַֽמַּאֲכֶ֖ם <sup>2930 </sup> <n>also when ye defile</n> אֹתָ֑הּ <sup>853 </sup> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> קָאָ֛ה <sup>6958 </sup> <n>it as it spued out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגּ֖וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that [were] before</n>
29: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>For whosoever shall commit</n> מִכֹּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>any of these abominations</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> וְנִכְרְת֛וּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>[them] shall be cut off</n> הַנְּפָשׁ֥וֹת <sup>5315 </sup> <n>even the souls</n> הָעֹשֹׂ֖ת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that commit</n> מִקֶּ֥רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>from among</n> עַמָּֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>their people</n>
30: וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Therefore shall ye keep</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֗י <sup>4931 </sup> <n>mine ordinance</n> לְבִלְתִּ֨י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>not</n> עֲשׂ֜וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that [ye] commit</n> מֵחֻקּ֤וֹת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>customs</n> הַתּֽוֹעֵבֹת֙ <sup>8441 </sup> <n>not [any one] of these abominable</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נַעֲשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which were committed</n> לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִֽטַּמְּא֖וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>you and that ye defile</n> בָּהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>not yourselves therein I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> פ
